MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  SY13 postcode area of Whitchurch, affecting properties in Doddington, Newport Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.52AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.56AM on 31st January 2021.
